analysis.description:
NeobitToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/38/0x4fe3c4e0c8fcf9ef23b1391cad0205b3e338e013.sol#96-97) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x4fe3c4e0c8fcf9ef23b1391cad0205b3e338e013.sol#205-217)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/38/0x4fe3c4e0c8fcf9ef23b1391cad0205b3e338e013.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/38/0x4fe3c4e0c8fcf9ef23b1391cad0205b3e338e013.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x4fe3c4e0c8fcf9ef23b1391cad0205b3e338e013.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
